DOC.brief_summary: Trimethylamine N-oxide ( TMAO ) small organic compound naturally present fish seefood generate bacterial breakdown dietary phosphatidylcholine carnitine-containing food within human gut microbiome . Elevated serum TMAO previously report associate elevated risk cardiovascular event . Aim study investigate association plasma level TMAO Mediterranean diet cohort healthy adult .
